caption.title: Strengths and limitations of this study

list-item.p: A long-term period (20 years) on the trend of liver cancer burden in China was evaluated in this study.
Disease burden trends and the associated risk factors of liver cancer were quantified to reveal the extent of the epidemic and suggest potential strategies against liver cancer.
The findings might be limited by the fact that the data used in this study were secondary estimated data rather than the original epidemic or surveillance data.
